name: Mochi in Space with Bunnies
description:
Every month on the full moon, space bunnies gather to make mochi for the hungry people of Earth.

For millennia they have pounded the mochi with giant hammers, but there are new fads among the youngest, hippest bunnies.

Mochi Volleyball - the rice is stuffed into a sack, and as the bunnies play, it gets squished into delicious mochi. This game is popular among couples and friends.

Mochi Juggling - solitary bunnies love to juggle two sacks of rice. The longer they stay off the surface of the moon, the tastier the mochi!

Help the bunnies play their games! Instructions in game.
